result.title: Решето Эратосфена
result.content:
Code
// Made by Dilzhan : Dilzhan, DiIzhan, DilzhanZ, N0t_Dilzhan, D.i.l.z.h.a.n, 011-11808-08-Dilzhan, 011-11808-09-Dilzhan, NotSoStupid...

#include <bits/stdc++.h>

using namespace std;

#define F first
#define S second
#define pb push_back
#define np next_permutation
#define bs binary_search
#define y1 road_to_respa_bronze
#define mp make_pair
#define all(x) x.begin(), x.end()
#define ios ios_base::sync_with_stdio(0)

typedef long long llong;
typedef long double ldouble;
typedef unsigned long long ullong;
typedef vector <llong> vl;
typedef vector <bool> vb;
typedef vector <char> vc;
typedef vector <int> vi;
typedef vector <string> vs;
typedef pair <llong, llong> pll;
typedef map <llong, llong> mll;
typedef set <llong> sl;
typedef set <char> sc;
typedef map <string, llong> msl;
typedef map <string, bool> msb;
typedef map <char, llong> mcl;

const llong MXN = 1e6 + 1;
const llong MNN = 1e3 + 1;
const llong MOD = 1e9 + 7;
const llong INF = 1e18;
const ldouble EPS = 1e-9;
const ldouble PI = 3.1415926536;
const string TIME = "rovno_ushten_push_ketti";

bool prime[MXN];

int main () {
    ios;
    freopen ("input.txt", "r", stdin);
    prime[0] = prime[1] = 1;
    for (llong i = 2; i <= 1000000; i ++) {
        if (!prime[i]) {
            for (llong j = i * i; j <= 1000000; j += i) {
                prime[j] = 1;
            }
        }
    } return 0;
}
